title: Mary Berry's classic Christmas cake
description: Mary Berry’s been making her Christmas cake recipe for as long as Paul Hollywood’s been alive. She knows what she’s talking about.
ingredients: 350g/12oz natural glacé cherries, halved, rinsed, and thoroughly dried
150ml/¼pt brandy or sherry, plus extra for feeding
about 3 tbsp apricot jam, warmed and sieved
